sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground } from 'docz'
import Stage from '../stage'
import { Sprite } from '../index'
import times from 'lodash/times'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"stage"}}>{`Stage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Stage component renders a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`PIXI.Application`}</MDXTag>{` onto a canvas element and makes the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`PIXI.Application`}</MDXTag>{` available for child components using the React's Context API.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Renderer: React DOM.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Prop`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Default value`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`width`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`the width of the renderers view`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`800`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`height`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`the height of the renderers view`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`800`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`onMount`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`callback function for the created app instance`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`onUnMount`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`callback function when the Stage gets unmounted`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`raf`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`use the internal PIXI ticker (requestAnimationFrame)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`true`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`renderOnComponentChange`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`render stage on Stage changes? only useful in combination with `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`raf`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`true`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`options`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`see `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/release/docs/PIXI.Application.html"}}>{`PIXI.Application options`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage"}}>{`Usage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`import { render } from 'react-dom'
import { Stage, Container, Sprite } from '@inlet/react-pixi'

const App = () => (
  <Stage width={500} height={400}>
    { // PIXI components here... }
  </Stage>
)

render(<App />, document.getElementById('root'))
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"example"}}>{`Example`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={0} __code={`{() => {
  const count = 10
  const stageProps = {
    height: 300,
    width: 500,
    options: {
      backgroundColor: 0x07ff9c,
      antialias: true,
      roundPixel: true,
    },
  }
  return (
    <Stage {...stageProps}>
      {times(count, i => (
        <Sprite
          key={i}
          image="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/693612/coin.png"
          scale={(360 / count) * 0.004}
          anchor={0.5}
          rotation={i * (360 / count) * (Math.PI / 180)}
          x={250 + Math.cos(i * (360 / count) * (Math.PI / 180)) * 100}
          y={150 + Math.sin(i * (360 / count) * (Math.PI / 180)) * 100}
        />
      ))}
    </Stage>
  )
}}`} __scope={{props,Stage,Sprite,times}}>
  {() => {
    const count = 10
    const stageProps = {
      height: 300,
      width: 500,
      options: {
        backgroundColor: 0x07ff9c,
        antialias: true,
        roundPixel: true,
      }
    }
return (
  <Stage {...stageProps}>
    {
      times(count, i => (
        <Sprite key={i}
                image="https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/s.cdpn.io/693612/coin.png"
                scale={(360/count) * 0.004}
                anchor={0.5}
                rotation={(i * (360/count)) * (Math.PI / 180)}
                x={250 + Math.cos((i * (360/count)) * (Math.PI / 180)) * 100}
                y={150 + Math.sin((i * (360/count)) * (Math.PI / 180)) * 100}  />
      ))
    }
  </Stage>
)
  }}
